name: Jigsaw Solitaire Lights
description:
You like jigsaw games and solitaire? This game combines the two to bring you a new original jigsaw puzzle idea! How many tries will it take you to complete the jigsaw??

The puzzle pieces come out like a deck of cards and you cycle through all the pieces. If you get stuck you can skip or get hints, to keep it in the fun zone :)

This collection of puzzle pictures features a magnificent collection of photographs with the theme of LIGHT!

FEATURES

Original jigsaw puzzle idea accompanied by beautiful photography and relaxing music
15 delightful photographs
Many hours of game play with multiple jigsaws to conquer
Several difficulty levels, from trained baby to extreme
Game works in both portrait and landscape mode
